text: Chibwedziva is a place in Chiredzi District, Masvingo Province, Zimbabwe. Almost 99% of the inhabitants are Tsonga Shangaan people. It has a secondary school.http://www.masvingomirror.com/2017/02/parents-put-law-into-own-hands- chase.html?m=1 ==References== Category:Chiredzi District Category:Populated places in Masvingo Province
title: Chibwedziva
